title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hamas Command in Gaza: Precision Attack on Terrorist Hideout Near School”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a Hamas command and control compound that was concealed within the Hadija school area in the center of the Gaza Strip. During the attack, Hamas operatives who were hiding and operating from the compound were eliminated.

Fighter jets struck a short while ago, guided by intelligence information from the Military Intelligence Directorate (Aman), the Shin Bet, and the Southern Command, targeting terrorists operating within the Hamas command and control compound that was disguised in the vicinity of the Hadija school in central Gaza.

The infrastructure space served as a hideout for Hamas militants, from which various terrorist plots were advanced and executed against IDF forces and the State of Israel. Meanwhile, numerous weapons were developed and stored in the compound.

Prior to the attack, extensive measures were taken to minimize the possibility of harm to civilians, including the use of munitions tailored to the nature of the strike, precise calculations, and other intelligence information.

The terrorist organization Hamas systematically violates international law, ruthlessly exploiting civilian institutions and the population as human shields for its actions and terrorist needs.
